cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemShortDescription: Kentico is thrilled to invite our community to a series of dynamic and engaging events. Whether you're a marketing professional eager to stay ahead of the curve or you're interested in the latest digital experience technologies, we've got something tailored just for you.
cms.contentitemcommondata.BasicItemTitle: Mark Your Calendars: Exciting Events With Kentico in April 2025!

{"editableAreas":[{"identifier":"main","sections":[{"identifier":"bd1f1419-7fcb-4f5b-926c-40993cd2ba06","type":"CommunityPortal.SingleColumnSection","properties":{"layout":"Standard","layoutParsed":0,"paddingTop":"Large","paddingTopParsed":0,"paddingBottom":"Large","paddingBottomParsed":0,"backgroundColor":"White","backgroundColorParsed":1},"zones":[{"identifier":"bc663357-2b02-4bb3-8c2e-6e50b23a400c","widgets":[{"identifier":"43bca758-abdb-40bc-901a-e0f8e570f60f","type":"CommunityPortal.MarkdownWidget","variants":[{"identifier":"ccac0b85-4b6a-4f02-953c-cf3de20c08fa","properties":{"markdown":"Kentico is thrilled to invite our community to a series of dynamic and engaging events. Whether you're a marketing professional eager to stay ahead of the curve or you're interested in the latest digital experience technologies, we've got something tailored just for you.

These events not only provide a platform to learn about the latest industry trends but also offer a chance to connect with peers and experts in a meaningful way.

We're excited to see you there and to explore new possibilities together. Stay tuned for more updates as we get closer to these dates!

For more information on our upcoming events and to stay updated, visit [Kentico Events](https://www.kentico.com/discover/events "https://www.kentico.com/discover/events").

**Event:** Trends and Tastings: A 2025 Marketing Roundtable
* **Co-hosts:** Thundertech and Kentico
* **Location**: Michael Angelo's Bakery, 8035 Broadview Road Broadview Heights, OH
* **Why attend?** This exclusive event promises expert insights, engaging roundtable discussions, and excellent networking opportunities. It's the perfect setting to explore the latest trends and challenges in the marketing world.
* **Registration:** Reserve your spot: Trends and Tastings - [Register Here](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/trends-tastings-a-2025-marketing-roundtable-tickets-1251953579859?aff=oddtdtcreator).

**Location:** San Diego
* **Event Overview:** Join us at the SWAAY.health event to delve into the future of healthcare technology and digital experiences. Meet our team from BizStream and Kentico as they share valuable insights on crafting superior digital experiences in the healthcare industry.
* **More Info:** For event details and to schedule a meeting with our team, visit: [SWAAY.health Conference 2025](https://www.kentico.com/discover/events/swaay-health-conference-2025).

**Location:** Las Vegas
* **Event Theme:** Play & Win with SilverTech and Kentico
* **Highlights:** Visit our booth to test your skills in "Beat the Experts" and learn how our solutions can empower your business. It’s a fun and interactive way to engage with our experts and explore financial marketing and technology innovations.
* **Details:** Check out our event page for more information: [Financial Brand Forum - Kentico and SilverTech](https://www.kentico.com/discover/events/financial-brand-forum-kentico-and-silvertech_2025).
